scripts.build-test-nohash: lerna run build --stream --scope @kibalabs/everypage-cli --include-dependencies && lerna run build-nohash --stream --scope @kibalabs/everypage-test
scripts.serve-test: lerna run build --stream --scope @kibalabs/everypage-cli --include-dependencies && lerna run serve --stream --scope @kibalabs/everypage-test
scripts.clean: find . -type d -name node_modules -exec rm -rf '{}' \;; find . -type d -name dist -exec rm -rf '{}' \;; find . -type f -name package-lock.json -exec rm '{}' \;
